title: Why can't I "allow all the time" except for on very specific apps?
content:
An app I've used often requires location to be on all the time in order to work. It can't push the information I need to notifications unless it has background permissions for location.

Yet when I go to the permissions, the most open option I can choose is "only when using the app". Therefore I can only get notifications when I open the app.

How can I set this app to have location permission "all the time"? Why isn't the option available?
